laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echogenicity with no focal lesions present. The portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. The common bile duct measures 5 mm and is normal. The gallbladder shows severe gallbladder wall thickening measuring up to 9 mm with an irregular heterogeneous wall and pericholecystic fluid along with stones and sludge. The patient had a positive sonographic ___ sign. The right kidney has a simple anechoic thin-walled 2.6 x 2.6 x 2.7 cm cyst in the upper pole.
8.9 mg/dL, which is within the normal range (ref range 8.4 - 10.3).
